items.sentence: I noticed a note on my desk, but I don't know who wrote it.
You shouldn't say such a thing in the presence of children.
Let's get out of here. I don't want to get into any fights.
I haven't eaten all the ice cream. There's still some left.
It's important for us to help those less fortunate than us.
Tom is going to Australia as an exchange student next year.
Tom took out the hard drive and replaced it with a new one.
It's raining so hard today that even fish need an umbrella.
A number of interesting items are on display at the museum.
You must remove your shoes when you enter a Japanese house.
